text: Dalbergia rimosa is a species of liana (or treelet), with the Vietnamese name trắc giây or trắc dây. The genus Dalbergia is placed in the subfamily Faboideae and tribe Dalbergieae. == Subspecies == The Catalogue of Life lists: * D. r. foliacea (Benth.) Thoth. (Vietnamese: trắc lá) * D. r. griffithii * D. r. laevis * D. r. rimosa == References == Sanjappa M (1992) Legumes of India. Dehra Dun: Bishen Singh Mahendra... Thothathri K (1987) Taxonomic Revision of the Tribe Dalbergieae in the Indian... Gagnepain F (1913) In:Lecomte,H.(ed.), Flore Generale de L'Indochine 2, 2. Chen T.C (1994) Dalbergia &... In:Fl.Reip.Pop.Sinicae, 40 (Leguminosae 2) Phạm Hoàng Hộ (1999) Cây Cỏ Việt Nam: an Illustrated Flora of Vietnam vol. I publ. Nhà Xuẩt Bản Trẻ, HCMC, VN. ==External links== * rimosa Category:Flora of Indo-China Category:Flora of India (region)
title: Dalbergia rimosa
